Welcome to RandVis’s documentation!¶

RandomVisualization is a small Python package developed solely for pedagogical purposes. The key points illustrated are how to

  • visualize matrices using matplotlib.pyplot.imshow()
  • create a video from saved graphics files using FFmpeg
  • provide a simulation that provides a user interface to the simulated system
  • document code with Sphinx
  • create a distributable package using Python distutils

The package does nothing meaningful, it just generates a random matrix, modifies that matrix for each simulation step and displays the resulting matrix and mean element value at given intervals.
